signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.phonePattern: Please enter a valid phone number (10-15 digits)
signUp.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

errors.phone_already_exists: This phone number is already registered. Please use a different phone number or try signing in.
errors.email_already_exists: This email address is already registered. Please use a different email or try signing in.
errors.unknown_error: Something went wrong, please try again.
errors.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.validation_error: Please check your information and try again.
errors.incomplete_auth_data: Incomplete authentication data received. Please try again.
